casebody.data:
[The State ex rel.] McDonald, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. McDonald v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 99.]

*100(No. 96-154 Submitted May 26, 1998 Decided September 9, 1998.) Sheldon Karp Co., L.P.A., and R. Mark Gottfried,, for appellee. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Mary Ann O. Rini, Assistant Attorney General, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State ex rel. Tapp v. Parsec, Inc. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 417, 696 N.E.2d 591, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
